about_the_game:
The Anime Music Pack allows you to change the battle music and Sparking! Mode music to the anime theme songs like music that played during the anime!

Track List
• MAKAFUSHIGI ADVENTURE!
• Solid State Scouter
• DAN DAN KOKORO HIKARETEKU
• PROLOGUE & SUBTITLE 1
• PROLOGUE & SUBTITLE 2
• CHA-LA HEAD-CHA-LA (Days of Battle)
• Orewa Kakarot
• Broly Sentoukaishi
• DRAGON BALL SUPER -BROLY- Theme
• Blizzard
• SAIKYOU NO FUSION
• YAPPARI SAIKYO SONGOKU!! (WE GOTTA POWER)

*Please note that the song tracks are either TV-sized or shortened versions for the game.
detailed_description:
The Anime Music Pack allows you to change the battle music and Sparking! Mode music to the anime theme songs like music that played during the anime!

Track List

• Solid State Scouter
